Description_lang: Lash the target for $s1 Shadow damage, causing each combo point spent within $d to lash for an additional $394757s1. Dealing damage with Flagellation increases your Mastery by ${$s2/10*$mas}.1%, persisting $394758d after their torment fades.
AuraDescription_lang: $?$W2>0[$@auracaster is tormenting the target, dealing $394757s1 Shadow damage for each combo point spent.][Combo points spent deal $394757s1 Shadow damage to $@auracaster's tormented target. Mastery increased by ${$W3*$mas}.1%.]
